mapper.html:
⚠️ Order Quantity Exceeds Available Stock

Item: {{31.data.`Product Name`}}

Quantity Ordered: {{19.items[].quantity}}

Quantity in Stock: {{31.data.`In Stock`}}

The quantity requested exceeds the available stock. Please review and adjust the order quantity or initiate a restock to fulfill the order completely.

This is an automated notification — please take action accordingly.
mapper.subject: {{19.items[].productName}}: Maxed Out Order

designer.name: Send Email to Inventory Unit and Accounting Unit

filter.name: Check if Stocks are less than 10

mapper.html:
⚠️ Out of Stock Alert

Item: {{31.data.`Product Name`}}

This item is currently out of stock and needs to be restocked immediately.

Please review inventory levels and initiate a restock order as soon as possible to prevent shortages.

This is an automated notification. No reply is necessary.
mapper.subject: {{31.data.`Product Name`}}: Restock Alert

mapper.html:
Order Confirmation

Dear {{19.customer.name}},

Thank you for your order! We’re pleased to let you know that your order has been successfully received and is now being processed.

An invoice for your order has been attached to this email for your reference. Please review the details and keep it for your records.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team

We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.

Kind regards,
Fashion Maine
Jacksonville
mapper.subject: Order Confirmed 🎉 — Invoice Attached

mapper.html:
New Order Placed

Dear Accounting Team,

We would like to inform you that a new order has been placed. Please find the invoice for this order attached to this email.

Action Required: Kindly process the invoice as per standard procedures.

If you have any questions or need further details, please let us know.

Thank you,
[Your Name]
[Your Department or Company Name]
​
mapper.subject: Order Confirmation – Invoice Attached for Processing
